promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic epic lynx fighting-type pokemon with rocky fur. It can be found in ruins-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or lynx. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Rubblelynx, a a gigantic epic lynx fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in ruins-like environments It has the following abilities: Giga Hammer. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lynx", "fighting" or "Rubblelynx". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, lynx-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This colossal feline dwells in decrepit structures, its Giga Hammer ability shaping the ruins. Commonly seen grappling with boulders at dawn.
